programme.title: Charlie Moore: No Offense
programme.desc: The show heads to Lake Pawtuckaway in southern New Hampshire. Charlie makes an impromptu stop at a farm stand to try the local goat's milk, while son Anthony heads to Pawtuckaway Trading Post and learns how to shoot a bow.

programme.title: Charlie Moore: No Offense
programme.desc: Charlie heads north to Hanover, New Hampshire to fish the Connecticut River, with the goal of catching a largemouth bass, a smallmouth bass and a pickerel all in one day. He also offers his thoughts on Chubby Checker and the Twist.

programme.title: Charlie Moore: No Offense
programme.desc: Charlie and the Mad Fish Crew head to sunny Florida and fishes in a 3-team tournament. Loser buys drinks!

programme.title: Charlie Moore: No Offense
programme.desc: Charlie takes the lead after Round 1, but in Round 2 the weather takes a major turn for the worse.

programme.title: Charlie Moore: No Offense
programme.desc: The final day of a 3-day Florida fishing classic, with The Mad Fisherman feeling confident he will be victorious. Plenty of drama follows ... loser buys drinks!

programme.title: Pasta's Season of Goals 2022-23
programme.desc: A look back at David Pastrnak's historic season, showcasing all of his 61 goals from the 2022-23 season.

programme.title: 2018 Red Sox Alumni Game
programme.desc: Featuring some of the most popular Red Sox in history including Pedro Martinez, Wade Boggs, Mike Lowell, Derek Lowe, Bill Lee, and many more. Dwight Evans and Luis Tiant serve as team managers.
